results.content: maybe the corse needs details on view components creation and more details about create and package multiple components into one angular element project

response.content_html:
Hi,

To build multiple components in one Angular project which are siblings, you just need to add those components in entryComponents: [OneComponent, TwoComponent] and register those components as elements in ngDoBootstrap() method in app.module.ts file. For example -

const elm1 = createCustomElement(OneComponent, { injector: this.injector });
customElements.define('custom-element-one', elm1);
const elm2 = createCustomElement(TwoComponent, { injector: this.injector });
customElements.define('custom-element-two', elm2);

Now you can load both the components in your application.

I have attached an example in section - 3 lecture-17. Please have a look.

About first question, I am little confused. Can you please give more inputs of what exactly do you mean by view components? That will help me provide some thoughts about it.

results.content_html: maybe the corse needs details on view components creation and more details about create and package multiple components into one angular element project
